title: The Compressed Differential Heuristic.
abstract: The differential heuristic (DH) is an effective memory-based heuristic for explicit state spaces. In this paper, we aim to improve its performance and memory usage. We introduce a compression method for DHs which stores only a portion of the original uncompressed DH, while preserving enough information to enable efficient search.
